original_text: Remember that Shimei is still there to give you trouble. He is the son of Gera who came from Bahurim, and he belonged to Benjamin's tribe. When I went to Mahanaim, he prayed that terrible things would happen to me. But when he came to meet me at the Jordan River, I made a promise to him. I promised him in the Lord's name that I would not punish him with death.
korean_text: 바후림 베냐민 사람 게라의 아들 시므이가 너와 함께 있나니 그는 내가 마하나임으로 갈 때에 악독한 말로 나를 저주하였느니라 그러나 그가 요단에 내려와서 나를 영접하므로 내가 여호와를 두고 맹세하여 이르기를 내가 칼로 너를 죽이지 아니하리라 하였노라

sentences.original_text: Remember that Shimei is still there
sentences.korean_translation: 시므이가 여전히 거기에 있다는 것을 기억하라

sentences.original_text: He is the son of Gera
and he belonged to Benjamin's tribe
he prayed that terrible things would happen to me
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 무서운 일이 내게 일어나기를 기도했다

sentences.original_text: But when he came to meet me
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 그가 나를 만나러 왔을 때

sentences.original_text: I made a promise to him
I promised him in the Lord's name
that I would not punish him with death
